snippet: Dr. Shinn championed the ecumenical movement and argued for a sharper sense of ethical and social responsibility on the part of moderate Protestant churches.
abstract: Rev Dr Roger L Shinn, educator, administrator and author who championed the ecumenical movement and social activism in moderate Protestant churches in the 1950s and 1960s, dies at age 96.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Shinn championed the ecumenical movement and argued for a sharper sense of ethical and social responsibility on the part of moderate Protestant churches.

headline.seo: Rev. Dr. Roger L. Shinn, Theologian, Dies at 96
headline.main: Rev. Dr. Roger L. Shinn, Theologian, Dies at 96
headline.print_headline: Rev. Dr. Roger L. Shinn, 96; Linked Faith to Social Causes
